original_text: And the rough goat is the king of Grecia: and the great horn that is between his eyes is the first king.
korean_text: 털이 많은 숫염소는 곧 헬라 왕이요 그의 두 눈 사이에 있는 큰 뿔은 곧 그 첫째 왕이요

sentences.original_text: And the rough goat is the king of Grecia:
and the great horn that is between his eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 눈 사이에 있는 큰 뿔은
